== Perunad (628313) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Perunad is a village in the [[Ranni]] taluka of [[Pathanamthitta]] district with an area of 7523 hectares and harbouring 4130 households with total population of 15018 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Pathanamthitta]] is at a distance of 24 km. Male population is 7192 and female population is 7826. Scheduled Caste Population is 1865 and Scheduled Tribes population is 647. Census Location Code of the village is 628313<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 13188 (87.81%)
* Literate male population: 6326 (87.96%)
* Literate female population: 6862 (87.68%)
